channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- AN_GradeBook
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- AN_GradeBook

item.title: CVE-2023-2709|2024-08-02T06:33:05.188Z -- unknown -- an_gradebook
item.description: The AN_GradeBook WordPress plugin through 5.0.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).

item.title: CVE-2023-2636|2024-08-02T06:26:09.772Z -- unknown -- an_gradebook
item.description: The AN_GradeBook WordPress plugin through 5.0.1 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by users with a role as low as subscriber
